channel.title: dock on Mike's ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in dock on Mike's ramblings

item.title: recent applications in OS X
item.description: This little snippet will give you a new little window for all those recent applications you launch â€“ I seem to have picked up a habit for closing applications down when I stop working with them for an hour or two (pages etc.) $ write com.apple.dock persistent-others -array-add \ '{ "tile-data" = { "list-type" = 1; }; "tile-type" = "recents-tile"; }' $ killall Dock
